name: wols.github.io
body:
# [NTP::Mechanize](http://wols.github.com/NTP-Mechanize/)

**A perlish interface to NTP things**

# [NTP::Mechanize::Stats](http://github.com/wols/NTP-Mechanize-Stats/)

**Play with NTP statistic files**

# [App::NTP::Adm::CLI](http://github.com/wols/App-NTP-Adm-CLI/)

**ntpadm and ntpadm-cli, a command-line interface for NTP systems**

See also [share/doc/ntpadm/](http://wols.github.io/ntpadm-doc/)...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
